attributes.additional_details: They not only scare the living daylights out of our beloved pets but also affect the wildlife and any ex or current service personnel suffering with PTSD.
attributes.background: Put a ban on the loud banger fireworks. You can now buy no noise ones so still get the same look but without the Bang!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make fireworks quieter: Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590838

Ban use and sale of non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599451
